sentences.en: ...a retired banker well known for his philanthropy.
sentences.cn: ...一位以乐善好施闻名的退休银行家。

sentences.en: Besides, I want you to tell me why I should not go in for philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 此外, 请你告诉我干吗我不应沉迷于博爱主义.

sentences.en: But now her horizon was enlarged by the vision of a prodigal philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 现在她却能用慷慨大度的慈善家的目光来眺望自己广阔的前程.

sentences.en: In Soapy's opinion the Law was more benign than Philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 在索比眼里,法律比救济更为宽厚.

sentences.en: Mr. Pickwick's countenance glowed with an expression of universal philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 匹克威克先生脸上闪耀着博爱众生的表情.

sentences.en: Nor, as some would have it, does his philanthropy necessarily magnify it.
sentences.cn: 或者说有人会这样做, 或者他的慈善事业不可避免地扩大了它.

sentences.en: Philanthropy experts say people should follow their hearts in giving.
sentences.cn: 慈善专家指出人们应该凭著他们的感觉来捐献.

sentences.en: Philanthropy undertakings are definite d to voluntary, civil management, antitrust.
sentences.cn: 慈善事业合理定位于自愿 、 民办,同时, 反垄断.

sentences.en: Philanthropy, done well, is a serious undertaking.
sentences.cn: 慈善事业如果要做好也非易事.

sentences.en: The most accurate description of the CGI is the Philanthropy Oscars.
sentences.cn: 最准确的描述的CGI是慈善奥斯卡.

sentences.en: The most basic is traditional corporate philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 最基础的部分是传统的企业慈善事业.

sentences.en: The Red Cross appeals to philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 红十字诉诸(求助于)人类的善心.

sentences.en: The Rockefeller of the Information Age, in business and philanthropy alike.
sentences.cn: 信息时代的洛克菲勒, 无论是商业还是慈善都很相似.

sentences.en: Their coming out here is likely to kickstart philanthropy in China.
sentences.cn: 他们的到来可能会启动中国的慈善事业.

sentences.en: We get together to discuss tax, properties and philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 我们在一起讨论税务 、 财产和慈善事宜.

sentences.en: You can abandon more money for philanthropy.
sentences.cn: 你能够为慈善事业多捐一点儿钱.

words.tran_cn: 慈善家，博爱主义者；乐善好施的人

trans.tran_cn: 博爱，慈善活动，慈善事业
trans.tran_en: the practice of giving money and help to people who are poor or in trouble
